thread.title: BRIEF-Piramal Enterprises To Transfer Certain Assets, Liabilities of Financial Services Unit To Piramal Finance ‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Piramal Enterprises To Transfer Certain Assets, Liabilities of Financial Services Unit To Piramal Finance ‍​

organizations.name: liabilities of financial services unit to piramal finance

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Piramal Enterprises Ltd:
* APPROVED PROPOSAL TO INITIATE TRANSFER OF CERTAIN ASSETS, LIABILITIES FORMING PART OF CO‘S FINANCIAL SERVICES UNIT TO PIRAMAL FINANCE ‍​
* DEAL FOR FOR UP TO 19.10 BILLION RUPEES‍​ Source text: bit.ly/2EChK0G Further company coverage:
